upload.title: Document Upload
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop files here or click to upload

consent.title: Health Information Consent
consent.data_usage: I understand how my health information will be used
consent.sharing: I consent to sharing my health information as described
consent.revocation: I understand I can revoke this consent at any time

hipaa_notice.title: HIPAA Privacy Notice
hipaa_notice.data_usage: This notice describes how medical information about you may be used and disclosed and how you can get access to this information. Please review it carefully.
hipaa_notice.consent_text: By proceeding, you acknowledge that you have received and understand our Notice of Privacy Practices

data_handling.collection: We collect health information to provide you with quality healthcare services
data_handling.protection: Your information is protected using industry-standard security measures
data_handling.sharing: Your health information may be shared with other healthcare providers involved in your care
data_handling.rights: You have the right to access, correct, and request restrictions on your health information

screen_reader.form_error: The form contains errors that need to be corrected
screen_reader.loading_state: Please wait while the content loads

aria_descriptions.document_upload: Upload your medical documents. Supported formats are PDF, JPG, and PNG
aria_descriptions.health_form: Complete your health declaration form with medical history and current conditions
aria_descriptions.interview_schedule: Schedule your medical interview with a healthcare professional

form.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address

api.general: An error occurred. Please try again
